features_descriptions: Average shipment distance covered in a route
Average lead time for shipments per route
Average planned shipment duration compared to actual duration
Weather impact score during planned shipment windows
Weather unpredictability score for shipment routes
Rate of rush shipments in the last quarter
Frequency of delays from a carrier in the last 6 months
Average transit hub count per shipment route
Average shipment interval consistency for carriers
Historical incident record on shipment routes
Proportion of shipments handled by a single carrier
